content: उदकं [उंद्-ण्वुल् नि° नलोपश्च <ls>Uṇ. 2. 39</ls>] Water; अनीत्वा पंकतां धूलिमुदकं नावतिष्ठते <ls>Śi. 2. 34.</ls> उदकं दा, -प्रदा or कृ To offer a libation of water to a dead person; उदकं उपस्पृश् to touch certain parts of the body with water, bathe; [<ab>cf.</ab> <ab>Gr.</ab> {%hudor%}; <ab>L.</ab> {%unda%} ‘a wave’].
